gameDetails.name: The 7th Continent: Fear the Devourers
gameDetails.description:
Fear the Devourers is the second gameplay add-on for The 7th Continent.

Beware of the insatiable Devourers!
Once they have your scent, these terrifying beasts will hunt you to the ends of the continent, erupting out of the ground at any moment!

Kickstarter Optional Buy. 7 Rock Worm figures, 30 cards.
